title: Champion Masteries
body: Will it go higher than lvl5 ?

replies.body: Yes They currently have pictures of the Level 6 and 7 which they did awhile ago and was even on the box for the preseason site with the crafting table thing it showed the level 7 mastery and the level 6 one was shown as a purple/pink colour with just an added stripe on the side. but with saying its not yet been said if they are going to bring them live any time soon http://imgur.com/a/Y3t9t can't find the Surrender @ 20 post but they had a talk about it

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/na/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html

Here's the link to the promo page for the crafting stuff from the season update promo. Theoretically that means it'll be out (or at least we'll know more) sometime during preseason (but no guarantees).
